title: Audit discount code usage
description: Check if customers are stacking codes. AOV gap of $37 is eating margin.

title: Review ASC creative breakdown
description: Only 1 campaign running - check which ads are dragging performance

title: Analyze abandoned checkouts
description: 3 checkouts today with 0 conversions - what's causing drop-off?

title: Check checkout flow for friction
description: Walk through checkout process, look for issues causing abandonment

title: Evaluate budget - pause or reduce?
description: If ROAS stays sub-1.5, consider pausing until diagnosis complete

title: Test new creative angles
description: Current creatives may be fatigued - brainstorm fresh hooks
